name: The Lost Prophecy-FMP game
description: The Lost Prophecy is a role-playing game that takes the player on a journey to find the main character's lost son. Throughout the game, the player will be met with enemies to defeat and collectables to collect as well as having to do puzzles. The game is inspired by the old Pokémon Red and blue game. The story of the game is about the main character losing his son and going through different obstacles getting older by the level until eventually finding his son but then dying knowing that his son is safe.
